message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $13,000. It's in excellent condition and would be a great value for you. What do you think?
I appreciate your time and consideration, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Can you meet me at that price?

Bob, I appreciate your offer.  While I understand you're looking for a lower price, $10,000 just doesn't work for me. I'm willing to come down to $11,500.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product. What do you say?
Alice, I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'd be willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $11,000. Can you consider that?
